metadata.title: CVE-2019-11157 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Improper conditions check in voltage settings for some Intel(R) Processorsmay allow a privileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilegeand/or information disclosure via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
